member.name: M:TelemedApi.Controllers.PatientController.GetAllPatients
member.summary: Returns a list of all Patients

member.name: M:TelemedApi.Controllers.PatientController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the patient with the specified id if it exists, returns a 404 otherwise

member.name: M:TelemedApi.Controllers.PatientController.Update(System.String,Utils.Models.Patient)
member.summary: Updates an existing patient if it exists
member.returns: The updated patient or an error if no patient was found with that ID

member.name: M:TelemedApi.Controllers.PatientController.Delete(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the patient with specified id
